Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to property used by the Greenburgh North Castle Union Free School District number 12 and authorizes such school district to affiliate with Rising Ground, Inc.; repealer
Summary: Relates to property used by the Greenburgh North Castle Union Free School District number 12 and authorizes such school district to affiliate with Rising Ground, Inc.
LawCode: Amd §5, rpld §5 sub b, Chap 118 of 1969
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 118 of the laws of 1969, relating to a separate union free school district in the town of Greenburgh in the county of Westchester, in relation to property used by the Greenburgh North Castle Union Free School District number 12 and authorizing such school district to affiliate with Rising Ground, Inc.; and to repeal subdivision b of section 5 of chapter 118 of the laws of 1969, relating to a separate union free school district in the town of Greenburgh in the county of Westchester, relating to authorizing the Greenburgh North Castle Union Free School District number 12 to affiliate with any child care institution or entity other than St. Christopher's School, Inc.
